description_zh: 來自高海拔產區的精選紅茶，帶有天然的花香與蜜香，口感甘甜滑順。
description_en: Selected black tea from high-altitude estates, offering natural floral and honey notes with a sweet, smooth finish.

description_zh: 使用日本進口高品質抹茶粉，茶香濃厚，與牛奶交織出醇厚口感。
description_en: Made with high-quality matcha powder imported from Japan, creating a rich tea flavor and mellow taste.
